message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds significant value to me. Given its worth to you, I believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs and interests. I am offering this product to you at a special price of $11,000. This represents a substantial saving compared to its intrinsic value of $12,000 to you, while still allowing me to recoup a fair portion of its worth to me. I understand that making a decision like this requires careful consideration, so please take the time to think about it. Should you have any questions or require further information, feel free to ask. I look forward to the possibility of working together.
